-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Interfacing with the MediaWiki API
--   
--   A complete Haskell binding to the MediaWiki API letting you
--   programmatically access (read and write) MediaWiki content.
--   
--   See <a>http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API</a> and
--   <a>http://haskell.forkio.com/</a> for more.
@package mediawiki
@version 0.2.4


-- | Simple GET/de-ref of URLs; abstracting out networking backend/package.
module MediaWiki.Util.Fetch
readContentsURL :: URLString -> IO String
readUserContentsURL :: Maybe AuthUser -> Bool -> Bool -> URLString -> [(String, String)] -> IO ([(String, String)], String)
postContentsURL :: Maybe AuthUser -> URLString -> [(String, String)] -> [Cookie] -> String -> IO ([Cookie], [(String, String)], String)
data AuthUser
AuthUser :: String -> String -> AuthUser
authUserName :: AuthUser -> String
authUserPass :: AuthUser -> String
nullAuthUser :: AuthUser

-- | <tt>Cookie</tt> is the Haskell representation of HTTP cookie values.
--   See its relevant specs for authoritative details.
data Cookie :: *


-- | License : See the file LICENSE
--   
--   Status : Coded Stability : provisional portability : portable
--   
--   Codec for de/encoding URI strings via percent encodings (cf. RFC
--   3986.)
module MediaWiki.Util.Codec.Percent
getEncodedString :: String -> String
getDecodedString :: String -> String
getEncodedChar :: Char -> Maybe String
getDecodedChar :: String -> Maybe (Char, String)

module MediaWiki.Util.Codec.URLEncoder
encodeString :: String -> String
decodeString :: String -> String


-- | MediaWiki API internal utility functions.
module MediaWiki.API.Utils
pNodes :: String -> [Element] -> [Element]
pNode :: String -> [Element] -> Maybe Element
pLeaf :: String -> [Element] -> Maybe String
pAttr :: String -> Element -> Maybe String
pMany :: String -> (Element -> Maybe a) -> [Element] -> [a]
children :: Element -> [Element]
nsName :: String -> QName
without :: [String] -> [Attr] -> [Attr]
parseDoc :: (Element -> Maybe a) -> String -> Either (String, [String]) a
xmlContinue :: String -> String -> Element -> Maybe String
mbDef :: a -> Maybe a -> Maybe a
readMb :: Read a => String -> Maybe a
piped :: [String] -> String
opt :: String -> String -> Maybe (String, String)
optB :: String -> Bool -> Maybe (String, String)
opt1 :: String -> [String] -> Maybe (String, String)
mbOpt :: String -> (a -> String) -> Maybe a -> Maybe (String, String)

-- | The <a>fromMaybe</a> function takes a default value and and
--   <a>Maybe</a> value. If the <a>Maybe</a> is <a>Nothing</a>, it returns
--   the default values; otherwise, it returns the value contained in the
--   <a>Maybe</a>.
fromMaybe :: a -> Maybe a -> a


-- | Basic MediaWiki API types
module MediaWiki.API.Types
type UserName = String
type NamespaceID = String
type TimeString = String
data Direction
Up :: Direction
Down :: Direction
type RevID = String
type PageName = String
type UserID = String
data TimeArrow
Earlier :: TimeArrow
Later :: TimeArrow
type Timestamp = String
type Redirect = String
type SortKind = String
type CatName = String
type GroupName = String
type FilterLang = String
type WithRedirects = String
type URLString = String
type Token = String
type LangName = String
nullRevId :: RevID
nullTimestamp :: Timestamp
nullUser :: UserName
data PageTitle
PageTitle :: NamespaceID -> Title -> Maybe PageID -> Bool -> PageTitle
pgNS :: PageTitle -> NamespaceID
pgTitle :: PageTitle -> Title
pgMbId :: PageTitle -> Maybe PageID
pgMissing :: PageTitle -> Bool
emptyPageTitle :: PageTitle
mainNamespace :: NamespaceID
ns_MAIN :: NamespaceID
ns_IMAGE :: NamespaceID
data Format
Format :: FormatKind -> Bool -> Format
formatKind :: Format -> FormatKind
formatFormatted :: Format -> Bool
emptyFormat :: Format
xmlFormat :: Format
data FormatKind
FormatJSON :: FormatKind
FormatPHP :: FormatKind
FormatWDDX :: FormatKind
FormatXML :: FormatKind
FormatYAML :: FormatKind
FormatTxt :: FormatKind
FormatDbg :: FormatKind
type User = String
type Password = String
type LoginToken = String
type SessionID = String
type SessionToken = String
type ValueName = (String, String)
data UserInfo
UserInfo :: UserName -> UserID -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe (UserName, String) -> [String] -> [String] -> [(String, String)] -> [RateLimit] -> Maybe Int -> UserInfo
uiName :: UserInfo -> UserName
uiId :: UserInfo -> UserID
uiIsAnon :: UserInfo -> Bool
uiHasMessage :: UserInfo -> Bool
uiBlocked :: UserInfo -> Maybe (UserName, String)
uiGroups :: UserInfo -> [String]
uiRights :: UserInfo -> [String]
uiOptions :: UserInfo -> [(String, String)]
uiRateLimits :: UserInfo -> [RateLimit]
uiEditCount :: UserInfo -> Maybe Int
emptyUserInfo :: UserInfo
data RateLimit
RateLimit :: String -> Int -> Int -> RateLimit
rlName :: RateLimit -> String
rlHits :: RateLimit -> Int
rlSeconds :: RateLimit -> Int
data NamespaceInfo
NamespaceInfo :: String -> String -> Bool -> NamespaceInfo
nsId :: NamespaceInfo -> String
nsTitle :: NamespaceInfo -> String
nsSubpages :: NamespaceInfo -> Bool
data InterwikiEntry
InterwikiEntry :: String -> Bool -> Maybe Bool -> String -> Maybe String -> InterwikiEntry
iwPrefix :: InterwikiEntry -> String
iwLocal :: InterwikiEntry -> Bool
iwTranscludable :: InterwikiEntry -> Maybe Bool
iwUrl :: InterwikiEntry -> String
iwLanguage :: InterwikiEntry -> Maybe String
data UserSession
UserSession :: UserID -> UserName -> Maybe Password -> Maybe String -> Maybe SessionID -> LoginToken -> UserSession
sessUserId :: UserSession -> UserID
sessUserName :: UserSession -> UserName
sessPassword :: UserSession -> Maybe Password
sessCookiePrefix :: UserSession -> Maybe String
sessSessionId :: UserSession -> Maybe SessionID
sessToken :: UserSession -> LoginToken
data HelpRequest
HelpRequest :: Maybe Bool -> HelpRequest
helpVersion :: HelpRequest -> Maybe Bool
type Title = String
type PageID = String
type RevisionID = String
newtype PropKind
PropKind :: String -> PropKind
prKind :: PropKind -> String
newtype MetaKind
MetaKind :: String -> MetaKind
meKind :: MetaKind -> String
newtype ListKind
ListKind :: String -> ListKind
liKind :: ListKind -> String
newtype GeneratorKind
GeneratorKind :: String -> GeneratorKind
genKind :: GeneratorKind -> String
class APIRequest a where isPostable _ = False queryKind _ = QProp ""
showReq :: APIRequest a => a -> [Maybe (String, String)]
isPostable :: APIRequest a => a -> Bool
queryKind :: APIRequest a => a -> QueryKind
data QueryKind
QProp :: String -> QueryKind
QMeta :: String -> QueryKind
QList :: String -> QueryKind
QGen :: String -> QueryKind
data QueryRequest
QueryRequest :: [Title] -> [PageID] -> [RevisionID] -> [PropKind] -> [ListKind] -> [MetaKind] -> Maybe GeneratorKind -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> QueryRequest
quTitles :: QueryRequest -> [Title]
quPageIds :: QueryRequest -> [PageID]
quRevIds :: QueryRequest -> [RevisionID]
quProps :: QueryRequest -> [PropKind]
quLists :: QueryRequest -> [ListKind]
quMetas :: QueryRequest -> [MetaKind]
quGenerator :: QueryRequest -> Maybe GeneratorKind
quFollowRedirects :: QueryRequest -> Maybe Bool
quIndexPageIds :: QueryRequest -> Maybe Bool
emptyQuery :: QueryRequest
instance Eq Direction
instance Eq TimeArrow
instance Eq QueryKind


-- | Representing <tt>siteinfo</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.SiteInfo
data SiteInfoRequest
SiteInfoRequest :: [String] -> Maybe Bool -> Bool -> SiteInfoRequest
siProp :: SiteInfoRequest -> [String]
siFilterIW :: SiteInfoRequest -> Maybe Bool
siShowAllDBs :: SiteInfoRequest -> Bool
emptySiteInfoRequest :: SiteInfoRequest
data SiteInfoResponse
SiteInfoResponse :: [DBInfo] -> [NamespaceInfo] -> Maybe SiteInfo -> [NamespaceInfo] -> [(String, [String])] -> Maybe SiteStatistics -> [InterwikiEntry] -> [UserGroup] -> SiteInfoResponse
siDBReplInfo :: SiteInfoResponse -> [DBInfo]
siNamespaces :: SiteInfoResponse -> [NamespaceInfo]
siGeneral :: SiteInfoResponse -> Maybe SiteInfo
siNamespaceAliases :: SiteInfoResponse -> [NamespaceInfo]
siSpecialPageAliases :: SiteInfoResponse -> [(String, [String])]
siStatistics :: SiteInfoResponse -> Maybe SiteStatistics
siInterwiki :: SiteInfoResponse -> [InterwikiEntry]
siUserGroups :: SiteInfoResponse -> [UserGroup]
emptySiteInfoResponse :: SiteInfoResponse
type Permission = String
data UserGroup
UserGroup :: String -> [Permission] -> UserGroup
ugName :: UserGroup -> String
ugRights :: UserGroup -> [Permission]
data SiteInfo
SiteInfo :: PageName -> URLString -> String -> String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Maybe String -> Maybe Int -> SiteInfo
siteMainPage :: SiteInfo -> PageName
siteBase :: SiteInfo -> URLString
siteName :: SiteInfo -> String
siteGenerator :: SiteInfo -> String
siteLastRevision :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteCase :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteRightsCode :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteRights :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteLang :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteFallbackEncoding :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteWriteAPI :: SiteInfo -> Bool
siteTimezone :: SiteInfo -> Maybe String
siteTZOffset :: SiteInfo -> Maybe Int
data SiteStatistics
SiteStatistics :: Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> SiteStatistics
siPages :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siArticles :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siViews :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siEdits :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siImages :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siUsers :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siAdmins :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
siJobs :: SiteStatistics -> Integer
data DBInfo
DBInfo :: String -> String -> DBInfo
dbHost :: DBInfo -> String
dbLag :: DBInfo -> String
instance APIRequest SiteInfoRequest

module MediaWiki.API.Query.SiteInfo.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) SiteInfoResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe SiteInfoResponse
xmlDB :: Element -> Maybe DBInfo
xmlNS :: Element -> Maybe NamespaceInfo
xmlGr :: Element -> Maybe UserGroup
xmlIW :: Element -> Maybe InterwikiEntry
xmlSS :: Element -> Maybe (String, [String])
xmlSI :: Element -> Maybe SiteInfo
xmlStat :: Element -> Maybe SiteStatistics


-- | Representing Login requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Login
data LoginRequest
LoginRequest :: User -> Password -> Maybe String -> LoginRequest
lgName :: LoginRequest -> User
lgPassword :: LoginRequest -> Password
lgDomain :: LoginRequest -> Maybe String
emptyLogin :: User -> Password -> LoginRequest
data LoginResponse
LoginError :: Bool -> String -> Maybe String -> String -> LoginResponse
lgSuccess :: LoginResponse -> Bool
lgeError :: LoginResponse -> String
lgeDetails :: LoginResponse -> Maybe String
lgeWait :: LoginResponse -> String
LoginResponse :: Bool -> UserSession -> LoginResponse
lgSuccess :: LoginResponse -> Bool
lgSession :: LoginResponse -> UserSession
instance APIRequest LoginRequest


-- | Serializing Login requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Login.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) LoginResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe LoginResponse


-- | Representing <tt>alllinks</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllLinks
data AllLinksRequest
AllLinksRequest :: Maybe String -> Maybe PageName -> Maybe PageName -> Bool -> [String] -> Maybe NamespaceID -> Maybe Int -> AllLinksRequest
alContinueFrom :: AllLinksRequest -> Maybe String
alFrom :: AllLinksRequest -> Maybe PageName
alPrefix :: AllLinksRequest -> Maybe PageName
alUnique :: AllLinksRequest -> Bool
alProp :: AllLinksRequest -> [String]
alNamespace :: AllLinksRequest -> Maybe NamespaceID
alLimit :: AllLinksRequest -> Maybe Int
emptyAllLinksRequest :: AllLinksRequest
data AllLinksResponse
AllLinksResponse :: [PageTitle] -> Maybe String -> AllLinksResponse
alLinks :: AllLinksResponse -> [PageTitle]
alContinue :: AllLinksResponse -> Maybe String
emptyAllLinksResponse :: AllLinksResponse
instance APIRequest AllLinksRequest


-- | Representing <tt>allmessages</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllMessages
data AllMessagesRequest
AllMessagesRequest :: [String] -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> AllMessagesRequest
amMessages :: AllMessagesRequest -> [String]
amFilter :: AllMessagesRequest -> Maybe String
amLang :: AllMessagesRequest -> Maybe String
emptyAllMessagesRequest :: AllMessagesRequest
data AllMessagesResponse
AllMessagesResponse :: [MessageInfo] -> AllMessagesResponse
amsgMessages :: AllMessagesResponse -> [MessageInfo]
emptyAllMessagesResponse :: AllMessagesResponse
data MessageInfo
MessageInfo :: String -> Bool -> String -> MessageInfo
msgiName :: MessageInfo -> String
msgiMissing :: MessageInfo -> Bool
msgiContent :: MessageInfo -> String
emptyMessageInfo :: MessageInfo
instance APIRequest AllMessagesRequest


-- | Representing <tt>allpages</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllPages
data AllPagesRequest
AllPagesRequest :: Maybe PageName -> Maybe PageName -> NamespaceID -> Maybe WithRedirects -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> ([String], [String]) -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Direction -> Maybe FilterLang -> AllPagesRequest
apFrom :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe PageName
apPrefix :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe PageName
apNamespace :: AllPagesRequest -> NamespaceID
apFilterRedir :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe WithRedirects
apMinSize :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe Int
apMaxSize :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe Int
apProtTypeLevel :: AllPagesRequest -> ([String], [String])
apLimit :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe Int
apDir :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe Direction
apFilterLangLinks :: AllPagesRequest -> Maybe FilterLang
emptyAllPagesRequest :: AllPagesRequest
data AllPagesResponse
AllPagesResponse :: [PageTitle] -> Maybe String -> AllPagesResponse
apLinks :: AllPagesResponse -> [PageTitle]
apContinue :: AllPagesResponse -> Maybe String
emptyAllPagesResponse :: AllPagesResponse
instance APIRequest AllPagesRequest


-- | Representing <tt>allusers</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllUsers
data AllUsersRequest
AllUsersRequest :: Maybe UserName -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe GroupName -> [String] -> Maybe Int -> AllUsersRequest
auFrom :: AllUsersRequest -> Maybe UserName
auPrefix :: AllUsersRequest -> Maybe UserName
auGroup :: AllUsersRequest -> Maybe GroupName
auProp :: AllUsersRequest -> [String]
auLimit :: AllUsersRequest -> Maybe Int
emptyAllUsersRequest :: AllUsersRequest
data AllUsersResponse
AllUsersResponse :: [(UserName, Maybe Int, Maybe String)] -> Maybe String -> AllUsersResponse
auUsers :: AllUsersResponse -> [(UserName, Maybe Int, Maybe String)]
auContinue :: AllUsersResponse -> Maybe String
emptyAllUsersResponse :: AllUsersResponse
instance APIRequest AllUsersRequest

module MediaWiki.API.Query.BackLinks

blTitle :: BackLinksRequest -> Maybe String

blNamespace :: BackLinksRequest -> [NamespaceID]
blFilterRedir :: BackLinksRequest -> Maybe Redirect
blRedirect :: BackLinksRequest -> Maybe Bool
blLimit :: BackLinksRequest -> Maybe Int

blLinks :: BackLinksResponse -> [PageTitle]
blContinue :: BackLinksResponse -> Maybe String
emptyBackLinksResponse :: BackLinksResponse
instance APIRequest BackLinksRequest


-- | Representing <tt>blocks</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Blocks
data BlocksRequest
BlocksRequest :: Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe TimeArrow -> [UserID] -> [UserID] -> [String] -> Maybe Int -> [String] -> BlocksRequest
bkStart :: BlocksRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
bkEnd :: BlocksRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
bkDir :: BlocksRequest -> Maybe TimeArrow
bkIds :: BlocksRequest -> [UserID]
bkUsers :: BlocksRequest -> [UserID]
bkIp :: BlocksRequest -> [String]
bkLimit :: BlocksRequest -> Maybe Int
bkProp :: BlocksRequest -> [String]
emptyBlocksRequest :: BlocksRequest
data BlocksResponse
BlocksResponse :: [BlockInfo] -> Maybe String -> BlocksResponse
bkBlocks :: BlocksResponse -> [BlockInfo]
bkContinue :: BlocksResponse -> Maybe String
emptyBlocksResponse :: BlocksResponse
data BlockInfo
BlockInfo :: Maybe String -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> BlockInfo
bkId :: BlockInfo -> Maybe String
bkUser :: BlockInfo -> Maybe UserName
bkBy :: BlockInfo -> Maybe UserName
bkTimestamp :: BlockInfo -> Maybe Timestamp
bkExpiry :: BlockInfo -> Maybe Timestamp
bkReason :: BlockInfo -> Maybe String
bkRangeStart :: BlockInfo -> Maybe String
bkRangeEnd :: BlockInfo -> Maybe String
bkIsAuto :: BlockInfo -> Bool
bkIsAnonOnly :: BlockInfo -> Bool
bkIsNoCreate :: BlockInfo -> Bool
bkIsAutoBlock :: BlockInfo -> Bool
bkIsNoEmail :: BlockInfo -> Bool
bkIsHidden :: BlockInfo -> Bool
emptyBlockInfo :: BlockInfo
instance APIRequest BlocksRequest


-- | Representing <tt>categories</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Categories
data CategoriesRequest
CategoriesRequest :: [PropKind] -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> CategoriesRequest
clProps :: CategoriesRequest -> [PropKind]
clShow :: CategoriesRequest -> Maybe Bool
clLimit :: CategoriesRequest -> Maybe Int
clContinueFrom :: CategoriesRequest -> Maybe String
emptyCategoriesRequest :: CategoriesRequest
data CategoriesResponse
CategoriesResponse :: [(PageTitle, [PageTitle])] -> Maybe String -> CategoriesResponse
clPages :: CategoriesResponse -> [(PageTitle, [PageTitle])]
clContinue :: CategoriesResponse -> Maybe String
emptyCategoriesResponse :: CategoriesResponse
instance APIRequest CategoriesRequest


-- | Representing CategoryInfo requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.CategoryInfo
data CategoryInfoRequest
CategoryInfoRequest :: CategoryInfoRequest
emptyCategoryInfoRequest :: CategoryInfoRequest
data CategoryInfoResponse
CategoryInfoResponse :: [CategoryInfo] -> CategoryInfoResponse
ciPages :: CategoryInfoResponse -> [CategoryInfo]
emptyCategoryInfoResponse :: CategoryInfoResponse
data CategoryInfo
CategoryInfo :: PageTitle -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Bool -> CategoryInfo
ciPage :: CategoryInfo -> PageTitle
ciSize :: CategoryInfo -> Maybe Int
ciPageSize :: CategoryInfo -> Maybe Int
ciFiles :: CategoryInfo -> Maybe Int
ciSubCats :: CategoryInfo -> Maybe Int
ciHidden :: CategoryInfo -> Bool
emptyCategoryInfo :: CategoryInfo
instance APIRequest CategoryInfoRequest

-- | Representing <tt>deletedrevs</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.DeletedRevisions
data DeletedRevisionsRequest
DeletedRevisionsRequest :: Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe TimeArrow -> Maybe Int -> [String] -> DeletedRevisionsRequest
drStart :: DeletedRevisionsRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
drEnd :: DeletedRevisionsRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
drDir :: DeletedRevisionsRequest -> Maybe TimeArrow
drLimit :: DeletedRevisionsRequest -> Maybe Int
drProp :: DeletedRevisionsRequest -> [String]
emptyDeletedRevisionsRequest :: DeletedRevisionsRequest
data DeletedRevisionsResponse
DeletedRevisionsResponse :: [DeletedRevision] -> Maybe String -> DeletedRevisionsResponse
drRevisions :: DeletedRevisionsResponse -> [DeletedRevision]
drContinue :: DeletedRevisionsResponse -> Maybe String
emptyDeletedRevisionsResponse :: DeletedRevisionsResponse
data DeletedRevision
DeletedRevision :: PageTitle -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> DeletedRevision
drPage :: DeletedRevision -> PageTitle
drTimestamp :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe Timestamp
drRevId :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe RevID
drUser :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe UserName
drComment :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe String
drIsMinor :: DeletedRevision -> Bool
drLength :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe Int
drContent :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe String
drToken :: DeletedRevision -> Maybe String
emptyDeletedRevision :: DeletedRevision
instance APIRequest DeletedRevisionsRequest

-- | Representing <tt>imageinfo</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.ImageInfo
data ImageInfo
ImageInfo :: Timestamp -> UserName -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe URLString -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> ImageInfo
iiTimestamp :: ImageInfo -> Timestamp
iiUser :: ImageInfo -> UserName
iiWidth :: ImageInfo -> Maybe Int
iiHeight :: ImageInfo -> Maybe Int
iiSize :: ImageInfo -> Maybe Int
iiURL :: ImageInfo -> Maybe URLString
iiComment :: ImageInfo -> Maybe String
iiSHA1 :: ImageInfo -> Maybe String
iiArchive :: ImageInfo -> Maybe String
iiBitDepth :: ImageInfo -> Maybe Int
iiMime :: ImageInfo -> Maybe String
emptyImageInfo :: ImageInfo
data ImageInfoRequest
ImageInfoRequest :: [PropKind] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe (Int, Int) -> ImageInfoRequest
iiProp :: ImageInfoRequest -> [PropKind]
iiLimit :: ImageInfoRequest -> Maybe Int
iiStart :: ImageInfoRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
iiEnd :: ImageInfoRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
iiURLSize :: ImageInfoRequest -> Maybe (Int, Int)
emptyImageInfoRequest :: ImageInfoRequest
data ImageInfoResponse
ImageInfoResponse :: [(PageTitle, [ImageInfo])] -> Maybe String -> ImageInfoResponse
iiPages :: ImageInfoResponse -> [(PageTitle, [ImageInfo])]
iiContinue :: ImageInfoResponse -> Maybe String
emptyImageInfoResponse :: ImageInfoResponse
instance APIRequest ImageInfoRequest

aiMaxSize :: AllImagesRequest -> Maybe Int

-- | Representing <tt>info</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Info
data InfoRequest
InfoRequest :: [String] -> [String] -> InfoRequest
inProps :: InfoRequest -> [String]
inTokens :: InfoRequest -> [String]
emptyInfoRequest :: InfoRequest
data InfoResponse
InfoResponse :: [InfoPage] -> InfoResponse
infPages :: InfoResponse -> [InfoPage]
data InfoPage
InfoPage :: PageTitle -> TimeString -> RevID -> Integer -> Integer -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe Token -> Maybe Token -> Maybe Token -> Maybe Token -> [PageRestriction] -> InfoPage
infPage :: InfoPage -> PageTitle
infTouched :: InfoPage -> TimeString
infLastRevId :: InfoPage -> RevID
infCounter :: InfoPage -> Integer
infLength :: InfoPage -> Integer
infIsRedirect :: InfoPage -> Bool
infIsNew :: InfoPage -> Bool
infEditTok :: InfoPage -> Maybe Token
infDeleteTok :: InfoPage -> Maybe Token
infProtectTok :: InfoPage -> Maybe Token
infMoveTok :: InfoPage -> Maybe Token
infProtection :: InfoPage -> [PageRestriction]
emptyInfoResponse :: InfoResponse
emptyInfoPage :: InfoPage
data PageRestriction
PageRestriction :: PageID -> PageName -> String -> Integer -> TimeString -> Bool -> PageRestriction
prPageId :: PageRestriction -> PageID
prSource :: PageRestriction -> PageName
prType :: PageRestriction -> String
prLevel :: PageRestriction -> Integer
prExpiry :: PageRestriction -> TimeString
prCascade :: PageRestriction -> Bool
instance APIRequest InfoRequest


-- | Representing <tt>langlinks</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.LangLinks
data LangLinksRequest
LangLinksRequest :: Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> LangLinksRequest
llLimit :: LangLinksRequest -> Maybe Int
llContinueFrom :: LangLinksRequest -> Maybe String
emptyLangLinksRequest :: LangLinksRequest
data LangLinksResponse
LangLinksResponse :: [(PageTitle, [LangPageInfo])] -> Maybe String -> LangLinksResponse
llPages :: LangLinksResponse -> [(PageTitle, [LangPageInfo])]
llContinue :: LangLinksResponse -> Maybe String
emptyLangLinksResponse :: LangLinksResponse
data LangPageInfo
LangPageInfo :: LangName -> Maybe String -> LangPageInfo
langName :: LangPageInfo -> LangName
langTitle :: LangPageInfo -> Maybe String
emptyLangPageInfo :: LangPageInfo
instance APIRequest LangLinksRequest


-- | Representing <tt>logevents</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.LogEvents
data LogEventsRequest
LogEventsRequest :: [String] -> [String] -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe TimeArrow -> Maybe UserID -> Maybe PageName -> Maybe Int -> LogEventsRequest
leProp :: LogEventsRequest -> [String]
leType :: LogEventsRequest -> [String]
leStart :: LogEventsRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
leEnd :: LogEventsRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
leDir :: LogEventsRequest -> Maybe TimeArrow
leUser :: LogEventsRequest -> Maybe UserID
leTitle :: LogEventsRequest -> Maybe PageName
leLimit :: LogEventsRequest -> Maybe Int
emptyLogEventsRequest :: LogEventsRequest
data LogEventsResponse
LogEventsResponse :: [LogEvent] -> Maybe String -> LogEventsResponse
leEvents :: LogEventsResponse -> [LogEvent]
leContinue :: LogEventsResponse -> Maybe String
emptyLogEventsResponse :: LogEventsResponse
data LogEvent
LogEvent :: Maybe String -> PageTitle -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> [LogEventParam] -> Maybe String -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe String -> LogEvent
levLogId :: LogEvent -> Maybe String
levPage :: LogEvent -> PageTitle
levType :: LogEvent -> Maybe String
levAction :: LogEvent -> Maybe String
levParams :: LogEvent -> [LogEventParam]
levUser :: LogEvent -> Maybe String
levTimestamp :: LogEvent -> Maybe Timestamp
levComment :: LogEvent -> Maybe String
emptyLogEvent :: LogEvent
data LogEventParam
LogEventMove :: PageTitle -> LogEventParam
levMovePage :: LogEventParam -> PageTitle
LogEventPatrol :: Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> LogEventParam
levPatrolCurrent :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
levPatrolPrevious :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
levPatrolAuto :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
LogEventRights :: Maybe String -> Maybe String -> LogEventParam
levRightsOld :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
levRightsNew :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
LogEventBlock :: Maybe String -> Maybe String -> LogEventParam
levBlockDuration :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
levBlockFlags :: LogEventParam -> Maybe String
LogEventParam :: String -> LogEventParam
levParamValue :: LogEventParam -> String
LogEventOther :: String -> [(String, String)] -> LogEventParam
levParamName :: LogEventParam -> String
levParamAttrs :: LogEventParam -> [(String, String)]
instance APIRequest LogEventsRequest


-- | Representing <tt>random</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Random
data RandomPagesRequest
RandomPagesRequest :: [NamespaceID] -> Maybe Int -> RandomPagesRequest
rnNamespaces :: RandomPagesRequest -> [NamespaceID]
rnLimit :: RandomPagesRequest -> Maybe Int
emptyRandomPagesRequest :: RandomPagesRequest
data RandomPagesResponse
RandomPagesResponse :: [PageTitle] -> RandomPagesResponse
rnPages :: RandomPagesResponse -> [PageTitle]
emptyRandomPagesResponse :: RandomPagesResponse
instance APIRequest RandomPagesRequest


-- | Representing <tt>recentchanges</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.RecentChanges
data RecentChangesRequest
RecentChangesRequest :: Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe TimeArrow -> [NamespaceID] -> [PageName] -> [String] -> [String] -> Maybe Int -> [String] -> RecentChangesRequest
rcStart :: RecentChangesRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
rcEnd :: RecentChangesRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
rcDir :: RecentChangesRequest -> Maybe TimeArrow
rcNamespaces :: RecentChangesRequest -> [NamespaceID]
rcTitles :: RecentChangesRequest -> [PageName]
rcProp :: RecentChangesRequest -> [String]
rcShow :: RecentChangesRequest -> [String]
rcLimit :: RecentChangesRequest -> Maybe Int
rcType :: RecentChangesRequest -> [String]
emptyRecentChangesRequest :: RecentChangesRequest
data RecentChangesResponse
RecentChangesResponse :: [RecentChange] -> Maybe String -> RecentChangesResponse
rchChanges :: RecentChangesResponse -> [RecentChange]
rchContinue :: RecentChangesResponse -> Maybe String
emptyRecentChangesResponse :: RecentChangesResponse
data RecentChange
RecentChange :: Maybe String -> PageTitle -> Maybe PageTitle -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe UserName -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> RecentChange
rchType :: RecentChange -> Maybe String
rchPage :: RecentChange -> PageTitle
rchPageTo :: RecentChange -> Maybe PageTitle
rchRcId :: RecentChange -> Maybe RevID
rchRevId :: RecentChange -> Maybe RevID
rchRevOldId :: RecentChange -> Maybe RevID
rchUser :: RecentChange -> Maybe UserName
rchIsAnon :: RecentChange -> Bool
rchIsBot :: RecentChange -> Bool
rchIsNew :: RecentChange -> Bool
rchIsMinor :: RecentChange -> Bool
rchLength :: RecentChange -> Maybe Int
rchLengthOld :: RecentChange -> Maybe Int
rchTimestamp :: RecentChange -> Maybe String
rchComment :: RecentChange -> Maybe String
emptyRecentChange :: RecentChange
instance APIRequest RecentChangesRequest


-- | Representing <tt>revisions</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Revisions
data RevisionRequest
RevisionRequest :: [String] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe TimeString -> Maybe TimeString -> Maybe Direction -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe String -> [String] -> RevisionRequest
rvProp :: RevisionRequest -> [String]
rvLimit :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe Int
rvStartID :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe RevID
rvEndID :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe RevID
rvStart :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe TimeString
rvEnd :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe TimeString
rvDir :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe Direction
rvUser :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe UserName
rvExcludeUser :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe UserName
rvExpandTemplates :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe Bool
rvSection :: RevisionRequest -> Maybe String
rvTokens :: RevisionRequest -> [String]
emptyRevisionRequest :: RevisionRequest
data RevisionsResponse
RevisionsResponse :: [(PageTitle, [Revision])] -> Maybe String -> RevisionsResponse
rvPages :: RevisionsResponse -> [(PageTitle, [Revision])]
rvContinue :: RevisionsResponse -> Maybe String
emptyRevisionsResponse :: RevisionsResponse
data Revision
Revision :: PageTitle -> RevID -> Bool -> String -> Bool -> TimeString -> Integer -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Revision
revPage :: Revision -> PageTitle
revRevId :: Revision -> RevID
revIsMinor :: Revision -> Bool
revUser :: Revision -> String
revIsAnon :: Revision -> Bool
revTimestamp :: Revision -> TimeString
revSize :: Revision -> Integer
revComment :: Revision -> Maybe String
revContent :: Revision -> Maybe String
emptyRevision :: PageTitle -> Revision
instance APIRequest RevisionRequest


-- | Representing <tt>search</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Search
data SearchRequest
SearchRequest :: String -> [NamespaceID] -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe String -> Maybe Int -> SearchRequest
srSearch :: SearchRequest -> String
srNamespaces :: SearchRequest -> [NamespaceID]
srWhat :: SearchRequest -> Bool
srRedirects :: SearchRequest -> Bool
srOffset :: SearchRequest -> Maybe String
srLimit :: SearchRequest -> Maybe Int
emptySearchRequest :: String -> SearchRequest
data SearchResponse
SearchResponse :: [PageTitle] -> Maybe String -> SearchResponse
srPages :: SearchResponse -> [PageTitle]
srContinue :: SearchResponse -> Maybe String
emptySearchResponse :: SearchResponse
instance APIRequest SearchRequest


-- | Representing <tt>templates</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Templates
data TemplatesRequest
TemplatesRequest :: [NamespaceID] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> TemplatesRequest
tlNamespaces :: TemplatesRequest -> [NamespaceID]
tlLimit :: TemplatesRequest -> Maybe Int
tlContinueFrom :: TemplatesRequest -> Maybe String
emptyTemplatesRequest :: TemplatesRequest
data TemplatesResponse
TemplatesResponse :: [(PageTitle, [PageTitle])] -> Maybe String -> TemplatesResponse
tlPages :: TemplatesResponse -> [(PageTitle, [PageTitle])]
tlContinue :: TemplatesResponse -> Maybe String
emptyTemplatesResponse :: TemplatesResponse
instance APIRequest TemplatesRequest


-- | Representing <tt>usercontribs</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.UserContribs
data UserContribsRequest
UserContribsRequest :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe UserID -> Maybe String -> Maybe TimeArrow -> [NamespaceID] -> [String] -> [String] -> UserContribsRequest
ucLimit :: UserContribsRequest -> Maybe Int
ucStart :: UserContribsRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
ucEnd :: UserContribsRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
ucUser :: UserContribsRequest -> Maybe UserID
ucUserPrefix :: UserContribsRequest -> Maybe String
ucDir :: UserContribsRequest -> Maybe TimeArrow
ucNamespaces :: UserContribsRequest -> [NamespaceID]
ucProp :: UserContribsRequest -> [String]
ucShow :: UserContribsRequest -> [String]
emptyUserContribsRequest :: UserContribsRequest
data UserContribsResponse
UserContribsResponse :: [UserContrib] -> Maybe String -> UserContribsResponse
ucPages :: UserContribsResponse -> [UserContrib]
ucContinue :: UserContribsResponse -> Maybe String
emptyUserContribsResponse :: UserContribsResponse
data UserContrib
UserContrib :: UserName -> PageTitle -> RevID -> Maybe Timestamp -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe String -> UserContrib
ucoUser :: UserContrib -> UserName
ucoPage :: UserContrib -> PageTitle
ucoRevId :: UserContrib -> RevID
ucoTimestamp :: UserContrib -> Maybe Timestamp
ucoIsNew :: UserContrib -> Bool
ucoIsMinor :: UserContrib -> Bool
ucoIsTop :: UserContrib -> Bool
ucoComment :: UserContrib -> Maybe String
emptyUserContrib :: UserContrib
instance APIRequest UserContribsRequest


-- | Representing <tt>userinfo</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.UserInfo
data UserInfoRequest
UserInfoRequest :: [String] -> UserInfoRequest
uiProp :: UserInfoRequest -> [String]
emptyUserInfoRequest :: UserInfoRequest
data UserInfoResponse
UserInfoResponse :: UserInfo -> UserInfoResponse
uiUser :: UserInfoResponse -> UserInfo
emptyUserInfoResponse :: UserInfoResponse
instance APIRequest UserInfoRequest


-- | Representing <tt>users</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Users
data UsersRequest
UsersRequest :: [String] -> [UserID] -> UsersRequest
usProp :: UsersRequest -> [String]
usUsers :: UsersRequest -> [UserID]
emptyUsersRequest :: UsersRequest
data UsersResponse
UsersResponse :: [UsersInfo] -> UsersResponse
usrUsers :: UsersResponse -> [UsersInfo]
emptyUsersResponse :: UsersResponse
data UsersInfo
UsersInfo :: Maybe UserName -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Timestamp -> [String] -> Maybe (UserName, String) -> UsersInfo
usName :: UsersInfo -> Maybe UserName
usEditCount :: UsersInfo -> Maybe Int
usRegDate :: UsersInfo -> Maybe Timestamp
usGroups :: UsersInfo -> [String]
usBlock :: UsersInfo -> Maybe (UserName, String)
emptyUsersInfo :: UsersInfo
instance APIRequest UsersRequest


-- | Representing <tt>watchlist</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.WatchList
data WatchListRequest
WatchListRequest :: Bool -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Timestamp -> [NamespaceID] -> Maybe TimeArrow -> Maybe Int -> [String] -> [String] -> WatchListRequest
wlAllRev :: WatchListRequest -> Bool
wlStart :: WatchListRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
wlEnd :: WatchListRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
wlNamespaces :: WatchListRequest -> [NamespaceID]
wlDir :: WatchListRequest -> Maybe TimeArrow
wlLimit :: WatchListRequest -> Maybe Int
wlProp :: WatchListRequest -> [String]
wlShow :: WatchListRequest -> [String]
emptyWatchListRequest :: WatchListRequest
data WatchListResponse
WatchListResponse :: WatchList -> Maybe String -> WatchListResponse
wlWatch :: WatchListResponse -> WatchList
wlContinue :: WatchListResponse -> Maybe String
emptyWatchListResponse :: WatchListResponse
data WatchList
WatchList :: PageTitle -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe UserName -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> WatchList
wlPage :: WatchList -> PageTitle
wlRevId :: WatchList -> Maybe RevID
wlUser :: WatchList -> Maybe UserName
wlIsAnon :: WatchList -> Bool
wlIsNew :: WatchList -> Bool
wlIsMinor :: WatchList -> Bool
wlIsPatrolled :: WatchList -> Bool
wlTimestamp :: WatchList -> Maybe Timestamp
wlLength :: WatchList -> Maybe Int
wlOldLength :: WatchList -> Maybe Int
wlComment :: WatchList -> Maybe String
emptyWatchList :: WatchList
instance APIRequest WatchListRequest


-- | Representing ParamInfo requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.ParamInfo
data ParamInfoRequest
ParamInfoRequest :: [String] -> [String] -> ParamInfoRequest
paModules :: ParamInfoRequest -> [String]
paQueryModules :: ParamInfoRequest -> [String]
emptyParamInfoRequest :: ParamInfoRequest
data ParamInfoResponse
ParamInfoResponse :: [APIModule] -> ParamInfoResponse
parModules :: ParamInfoResponse -> [APIModule]
data APIModule
APIModule :: String -> String -> String -> [ModuleParam] -> APIModule
modName :: APIModule -> String
modClass :: APIModule -> String
modDescription :: APIModule -> String
modParams :: APIModule -> [ModuleParam]
data ModuleParam
ModuleParam :: String -> String -> String -> String -> ParamType -> ModuleParam
modParamName :: ModuleParam -> String
modParamDefault :: ModuleParam -> String
modParamDescription :: ModuleParam -> String
modParamPrefix :: ModuleParam -> String
modParamType :: ModuleParam -> ParamType
data ParamType
TypeBool :: ParamType
TypeString :: ParamType
TypeInteger :: ParamType
TypeTimestamp :: ParamType
TypeName :: String -> ParamType
TypeEnum :: [String] -> ParamType


-- | Representing Parse requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Parse
data ParseRequest
ParseRequest :: Maybe PageName -> String -> Maybe PageName -> Maybe RevID -> [String] -> ParseRequest
paTitle :: ParseRequest -> Maybe PageName
paText :: ParseRequest -> String
paPage :: ParseRequest -> Maybe PageName
paOldId :: ParseRequest -> Maybe RevID
paProp :: ParseRequest -> [String]
emptyParseRequest :: String -> ParseRequest
data ParseResponse
ParseResponse :: String -> Maybe RevID -> Maybe [LanguageLink] -> Maybe [CategoryLink] -> Maybe [Link] -> Maybe [Link] -> Maybe [String] -> Maybe [URLString] -> Maybe [TOCSection] -> ParseResponse
parText :: ParseResponse -> String
parRevId :: ParseResponse -> Maybe RevID
parLangLinks :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [LanguageLink]
parCategories :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [CategoryLink]
parLinks :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [Link]
parTemplates :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [Link]
parImages :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [String]
parExternalLinks :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [URLString]
parSections :: ParseResponse -> Maybe [TOCSection]
emptyParseResponse :: ParseResponse
data LanguageLink
LanguageLink :: String -> String -> LanguageLink
laLang :: LanguageLink -> String
laLink :: LanguageLink -> String
data CategoryLink
CategoryLink :: String -> String -> CategoryLink
caSortKey :: CategoryLink -> String
caLink :: CategoryLink -> String
data Link
Link :: String -> Bool -> String -> Link
liNamespace :: Link -> String
liExists :: Link -> Bool
liLink :: Link -> String
data TOCSection
TOCSection :: Int -> Int -> String -> String -> TOCSection
tocTocLevel :: TOCSection -> Int
tocLevel :: TOCSection -> Int
tocLine :: TOCSection -> String
tocNumber :: TOCSection -> String


-- | Representing OpenSearch requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.OpenSearch
data OpenSearchRequest
OpenSearchRequest :: String -> Maybe Int -> Maybe [Int] -> OpenSearchRequest
osSearch :: OpenSearchRequest -> String
osLimit :: OpenSearchRequest -> Maybe Int
osNamespaces :: OpenSearchRequest -> Maybe [Int]
emptyOpenSearchRequest :: String -> OpenSearchRequest
data OpenSearchResponse
OpenSearchResponse :: [OpenSearchHit] -> OpenSearchResponse
osHits :: OpenSearchResponse -> [OpenSearchHit]
data OpenSearchHit
OpenSearchHit :: String -> [String] -> OpenSearchHit
oshTitle :: OpenSearchHit -> String
oshMatches :: OpenSearchHit -> [String]


-- | Representing FeedWatchList requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.FeedWatchlist
data FeedWatchListRequest
FeedWatchListRequest :: Bool -> Maybe Int -> Bool -> FeedWatchListRequest
feAsAtom :: FeedWatchListRequest -> Bool
feHours :: FeedWatchListRequest -> Maybe Int
feAllRev :: FeedWatchListRequest -> Bool
emptyFeedWatchListRequest :: FeedWatchListRequest
data FeedWatchListResponse
FeedWatchListResponse :: String -> String -> [FeedItem] -> FeedWatchListResponse
fwFeedFormat :: FeedWatchListResponse -> String
fwFeedRaw :: FeedWatchListResponse -> String
fwFeedItems :: FeedWatchListResponse -> [FeedItem]
data FeedItem
FeedItem :: String -> URLString -> String -> String -> String -> String -> FeedItem
fiTitle :: FeedItem -> String
fiUrl :: FeedItem -> URLString
fiComment :: FeedItem -> String
fiTimestamp :: FeedItem -> String
fiUser :: FeedItem -> String
fiText :: FeedItem -> String


-- | Representing ExpandTemplates requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.ExpandTemplates
data ExpandTemplatesRequest
ExpandTemplatesRequest :: Maybe PageName -> String -> Maybe Bool -> ExpandTemplatesRequest
etTitle :: ExpandTemplatesRequest -> Maybe PageName
etText :: ExpandTemplatesRequest -> String
etGenXml :: ExpandTemplatesRequest -> Maybe Bool
emptyExpandTemplatesRequest :: ExpandTemplatesRequest
data ExpandTemplatesResponse
ExpandTemplatesResponse :: String -> Maybe String -> ExpandTemplatesResponse
etExpandedText :: ExpandTemplatesResponse -> String
etExpandedXml :: ExpandTemplatesResponse -> Maybe String
emptyExpandTemplatesResponse :: ExpandTemplatesResponse


-- | Serializing ExpandTemplates requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.ExpandTemplates.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ExpandTemplatesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ExpandTemplatesResponse


-- | Representing Sitematrix requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Sitematrix
data SitematrixRequest
SitematrixRequest :: SitematrixRequest
emptySitematrixRequest :: SitematrixRequest
data SitematrixResponse
SitematrixResponse :: Int -> [SiteSpecialInfo] -> [LanguageInfo] -> SitematrixResponse
smCount :: SitematrixResponse -> Int
smSpecials :: SitematrixResponse -> [SiteSpecialInfo]
smLanguages :: SitematrixResponse -> [LanguageInfo]
data SiteSpecialInfo
SiteSpecialInfo :: String -> URLString -> SiteSpecialInfo
siCode :: SiteSpecialInfo -> String
siUrl :: SiteSpecialInfo -> URLString
data LanguageInfo
LanguageInfo :: String -> String -> [SiteInfos] -> LanguageInfo
liCode :: LanguageInfo -> String
liName :: LanguageInfo -> String
liSites :: LanguageInfo -> [SiteInfos]
data SiteInfos
SiteInfos :: String -> SiteInfos
siInfo :: SiteInfos -> String


-- | Representing Unblock requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Unblock
data UnblockRequest
UnblockRequest :: Maybe String -> Maybe UserName -> Maybe Token -> Bool -> Maybe String -> UnblockRequest
ublkId :: UnblockRequest -> Maybe String
ublkUser :: UnblockRequest -> Maybe UserName
ublkToken :: UnblockRequest -> Maybe Token
ublkGetToken :: UnblockRequest -> Bool
ublkReason :: UnblockRequest -> Maybe String
emptyUnblockRequest :: UnblockRequest
instance APIRequest UnblockRequest


-- | Representing Watch requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Watch
data WatchRequest
WatchRequest :: PageName -> Bool -> WatchRequest
waTitle :: WatchRequest -> PageName
waIsUnwatch :: WatchRequest -> Bool
emptyWatchRequest :: WatchRequest
instance APIRequest WatchRequest


-- | Representing EmailUser requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.EmailUser
data EmailUserRequest
EmailUserRequest :: Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe Token -> Bool -> EmailUserRequest
emTarget :: EmailUserRequest -> Maybe String
emSubject :: EmailUserRequest -> Maybe String
emText :: EmailUserRequest -> Maybe String
emToken :: EmailUserRequest -> Maybe Token
emCcMe :: EmailUserRequest -> Bool
emptyEmailUserRequest :: EmailUserRequest
instance APIRequest EmailUserRequest


-- | Representing Edit requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Edit
data EditRequest
EditRequest :: Maybe PageName -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe Token -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe Timestamp -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> EditRequest
edTitle :: EditRequest -> Maybe PageName
edSection :: EditRequest -> Maybe String

-- | Page content
edText :: EditRequest -> Maybe String

-- | Edit token. You can get one of these through prop=info
edToken :: EditRequest -> Maybe Token
edSummary :: EditRequest -> Maybe String
edIsMinor :: EditRequest -> Bool
edIsNonMinor :: EditRequest -> Bool
edAsBot :: EditRequest -> Bool
edBaseTimestamp :: EditRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
edRecreate :: EditRequest -> Bool
edCreateOnly :: EditRequest -> Bool
edNoCreate :: EditRequest -> Bool
edCaptchaWord :: EditRequest -> Maybe String
edCaptchaId :: EditRequest -> Maybe String
edWatch :: EditRequest -> Bool
edUnwatch :: EditRequest -> Bool
edMD5 :: EditRequest -> Maybe String
edPrependText :: EditRequest -> Maybe String
edAppendText :: EditRequest -> Maybe String
emptyEditRequest :: EditRequest
instance APIRequest EditRequest


-- | Representing Move requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Move
data MoveRequest
MoveRequest :: Maybe PageName -> Maybe PageName -> Token -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> MoveRequest
mvFrom :: MoveRequest -> Maybe PageName
mvTo :: MoveRequest -> Maybe PageName
mvToken :: MoveRequest -> Token
mvReason :: MoveRequest -> Maybe String
mvMoveTalk :: MoveRequest -> Bool
mvNoRedir :: MoveRequest -> Bool
mvWatch :: MoveRequest -> Bool
mvUnwatch :: MoveRequest -> Bool
emptyMoveRequest :: MoveRequest
instance APIRequest MoveRequest


-- | Representing Block requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Block
data BlockRequest
BlockRequest :: UserName -> Token -> Bool -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe String -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> BlockRequest
blkUser :: BlockRequest -> UserName
blkToken :: BlockRequest -> Token
blkGetToken :: BlockRequest -> Bool
blkExpiry :: BlockRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
blkReason :: BlockRequest -> Maybe String
blkAnonOnly :: BlockRequest -> Bool
blkNoCreate :: BlockRequest -> Bool
blkAutoBlock :: BlockRequest -> Bool
blkNoEmail :: BlockRequest -> Bool
blkHide :: BlockRequest -> Bool
emptyBlockRequest :: BlockRequest
instance APIRequest BlockRequest


-- | Representing Protect requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Protect
data ProtectRequest
ProtectRequest :: PageName -> Token -> [(String, String)] -> Maybe Timestamp -> Maybe String -> Maybe Bool -> ProtectRequest
protTitle :: ProtectRequest -> PageName
protToken :: ProtectRequest -> Token
protProtections :: ProtectRequest -> [(String, String)]
protExpiry :: ProtectRequest -> Maybe Timestamp
protReason :: ProtectRequest -> Maybe String
protCascade :: ProtectRequest -> Maybe Bool
emptyProtectRequest :: ProtectRequest
instance APIRequest ProtectRequest


-- | Representing Undelete requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Undelete
data UndeleteRequest
UndeleteRequest :: PageName -> Token -> Maybe String -> [Timestamp] -> UndeleteRequest
udelTitle :: UndeleteRequest -> PageName
udelToken :: UndeleteRequest -> Token
udelReason :: UndeleteRequest -> Maybe String
udelTimestamps :: UndeleteRequest -> [Timestamp]
emptyUndeleteRequest :: UndeleteRequest
instance APIRequest UndeleteRequest


-- | Representing Delete requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Delete
data DeleteRequest
DeleteRequest :: PageName -> Token -> Maybe String -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe String -> DeleteRequest
delTitle :: DeleteRequest -> PageName
delToken :: DeleteRequest -> Token
delReason :: DeleteRequest -> Maybe String
delWatch :: DeleteRequest -> Maybe Bool
delUnwatch :: DeleteRequest -> Maybe Bool
delOldImage :: DeleteRequest -> Maybe String
emptyDeleteRequest :: DeleteRequest
instance APIRequest DeleteRequest


-- | Representing Rollback requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Rollback
data RollbackRequest
RollbackRequest :: PageName -> UserName -> Token -> Maybe String -> Maybe Bool -> RollbackRequest
rbTitle :: RollbackRequest -> PageName
rbUser :: RollbackRequest -> UserName
rbToken :: RollbackRequest -> Token
rbSummary :: RollbackRequest -> Maybe String
rbMarkBot :: RollbackRequest -> Maybe Bool
emptyRollbackRequest :: RollbackRequest
instance APIRequest RollbackRequest


-- | Representing <tt>links</tt> requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Query.Links
data LinksRequest
LinksRequest :: [NamespaceID] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe String -> LinksRequest
plNamespaces :: LinksRequest -> [NamespaceID]
plLimit :: LinksRequest -> Maybe Int
plContinueFrom :: LinksRequest -> Maybe String
emptyLinksRequest :: LinksRequest
data LinksResponse
LinksResponse :: [(PageTitle, [PageTitle])] -> Maybe String -> LinksResponse
plPages :: LinksResponse -> [(PageTitle, [PageTitle])]
plContinue :: LinksResponse -> Maybe String
emptyLinksResponse :: LinksResponse
instance APIRequest LinksRequest


-- | Collector module of types used by the MediaWiki API
module MediaWiki.API.Base

-- | Type collecting together the main parts of a MediaWiki API request.
data Request
Request :: Action -> Format -> Maybe Int -> Request
reqAction :: Request -> Action
reqFormat :: Request -> Format
reqMaxLag :: Request -> Maybe Int
emptyRequest :: Action -> Format -> Request
emptyXmlRequest :: Action -> Request
data Action
Sitematrix :: Action
Login :: LoginRequest -> Action
Logout :: Action
Query :: QueryRequest -> [String] -> Action
ExpandTemplates :: ExpandTemplatesRequest -> Action
Parse :: ParseRequest -> Action
OpenSearch :: OpenSearchRequest -> Action
FeedWatch :: FeedWatchListRequest -> Action
Help :: HelpRequest -> Action
ParamInfo :: ParamInfoRequest -> Action
Unblock :: UnblockRequest -> Action
Watch :: WatchRequest -> Action
EmailUser :: EmailUserRequest -> Action
Edit :: EditRequest -> Action
Move :: MoveRequest -> Action
Block :: BlockRequest -> Action
Protect :: ProtectRequest -> Action
Undelete :: UndeleteRequest -> Action
Delete :: DeleteRequest -> Action
Rollback :: RollbackRequest -> Action
OtherAction :: String -> [ValueName] -> Action
infoRequest :: InfoRequest
revisionRequest :: RevisionRequest
linksRequest :: LinksRequest
langLinksRequest :: LangLinksRequest
imagesRequest :: ImagesRequest
imageInfoRequest :: ImageInfoRequest
templatesRequest :: TemplatesRequest
categoriesRequest :: CategoriesRequest
allCategoriesRequest :: AllCategoriesRequest
allImagesRequest :: AllImagesRequest
allLinksRequest :: AllLinksRequest
allMessagesRequest :: AllMessagesRequest
allPagesRequest :: AllPagesRequest
allUsersRequest :: AllUsersRequest
backLinksRequest :: BackLinksRequest
embeddedInRequest :: EmbeddedInRequest
imageUsageRequest :: ImageUsageRequest
categoryInfoRequest :: CategoryInfoRequest
categoryMembersRequest :: CategoryMembersRequest
externalLinksRequest :: ExternalLinksRequest
externalURLUsageRequest :: ExternalURLUsageRequest
logEventsRequest :: LogEventsRequest
recentChangesRequest :: RecentChangesRequest
searchRequest :: String -> SearchRequest
siteInfoRequest :: SiteInfoRequest
userContribsRequest :: UserContribsRequest
userInfoRequest :: UserInfoRequest
watchListRequest :: WatchListRequest
blocksRequest :: BlocksRequest
deletedRevisionsRequest :: DeletedRevisionsRequest
usersRequest :: UsersRequest
randomPagesRequest :: RandomPagesRequest
data QueryRequestKind
InfoProp :: InfoRequest -> QueryRequestKind
RevisionsProp :: RevisionRequest -> QueryRequestKind
LinksPropProp :: LinksRequest -> QueryRequestKind
LangLinksProp :: LangLinksRequest -> QueryRequestKind
ImagesProp :: ImagesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
ImageInfoProp :: ImageInfoRequest -> QueryRequestKind
TemplatesProp :: TemplatesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
CategoriesProp :: CategoriesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
AllCategoriesProp :: AllCategoriesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
AllImagesProp :: AllImagesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
AllLinksProp :: AllLinksRequest -> QueryRequestKind
AllMessagesProp :: AllMessagesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
AllPagesProp :: AllPagesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
AllUsersProp :: AllUsersRequest -> QueryRequestKind
BacklinksProp :: BackLinksRequest -> QueryRequestKind
EmbeddedInProp :: EmbeddedInRequest -> QueryRequestKind
ImageUsageProp :: ImageUsageRequest -> QueryRequestKind
CategoryInfoProp :: CategoryInfoRequest -> QueryRequestKind
CategoryMembersProp :: CategoryMembersRequest -> QueryRequestKind
ExternalLinksProp :: ExternalLinksRequest -> QueryRequestKind
ExternalURLUsageProp :: ExternalURLUsageRequest -> QueryRequestKind
LogEventsProp :: LogEventsRequest -> QueryRequestKind
RecentChangesProp :: RecentChangesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
SearchProp :: SearchRequest -> QueryRequestKind
SiteInfoProp :: SiteInfoRequest -> QueryRequestKind
UserContribsProp :: UserContribsRequest -> QueryRequestKind
UserInfoProp :: UserInfoRequest -> QueryRequestKind
WatchListProp :: WatchListRequest -> QueryRequestKind
BlocksProp :: BlocksRequest -> QueryRequestKind
DeletedRevsProp :: DeletedRevisionsRequest -> QueryRequestKind
UsersProp :: UsersRequest -> QueryRequestKind
RandomProp :: RandomPagesRequest -> QueryRequestKind
qKind :: QueryRequestKind -> QueryKind


-- | Serializing MediaWiki API types
module MediaWiki.API.Output
showRequest :: Request -> String
showMaxLag :: Maybe Int -> String -> [String]
showFormat :: Format -> String
toReq :: APIRequest a => a -> [String]
showQueryRequestKind :: QueryRequestKind -> [String]
showAction :: Action -> String
showHelpRequest :: HelpRequest -> [String]
showQuery :: QueryRequest -> [String]
showExpandTemplates :: ExpandTemplatesRequest -> [String]
showPropKind :: PropKind -> String
showListKind :: ListKind -> String
showMetaKind :: MetaKind -> String
showParseRequest :: ParseRequest -> [String]
showOpenSearch :: OpenSearchRequest -> [String]
showFeedWatch :: FeedWatchListRequest -> [String]
showParamInfoRequest :: ParamInfoRequest -> [String]
showGeneratorKind :: GeneratorKind -> String
showValueName :: ValueName -> String
showBool :: Bool -> String
join :: [String] -> String
field :: String -> String -> String
fieldMb :: String -> (a -> String) -> Maybe a -> Maybe String
fieldList :: String -> String -> [String] -> Maybe String

module MediaWiki.API.Query.CategoryInfo.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) CategoryInfoResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe CategoryInfoResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe CategoryInfo
xmlCI :: PageTitle -> String -> Element -> Maybe CategoryInfo

module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllCategories.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) AllCategoriesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe AllCategoriesResponse
xmlCII :: Element -> Maybe CategoryInfo

module MediaWiki.API.Query.ImageInfo.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ImageInfoResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ImageInfoResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [ImageInfo])
xmlII :: String -> Element -> Maybe ImageInfo
readI :: String -> Maybe Int

module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllImages.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) AllImagesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe AllImagesResponse

module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllLinks.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) AllLinksResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe AllLinksResponse
xmlLink :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllMessages.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) AllMessagesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe AllMessagesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe MessageInfo

module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllPages.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) AllPagesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe AllPagesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.AllUsers.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) AllUsersResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe AllUsersResponse
xmlUser :: Element -> Maybe (UserName, Maybe Int, Maybe String)

module MediaWiki.API.Query.BackLinks.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) BackLinksResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe BackLinksResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Blocks.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) BlocksResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe BlocksResponse
xmlB :: Element -> Maybe BlockInfo

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Categories.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) CategoriesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe CategoriesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [PageTitle])
xmlCL :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.CategoryMembers.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) CategoryMembersResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe CategoryMembersResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.DeletedRevisions.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) DeletedRevisionsResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe DeletedRevisionsResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe DeletedRevision

module MediaWiki.API.Query.EmbeddedIn.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) EmbeddedInResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe EmbeddedInResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.ExternalLinks.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ExternalLinksResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ExternalLinksResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [URLString])
xmlEL :: Element -> Maybe URLString

module MediaWiki.API.Query.ExternalURLUsage.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ExternalURLUsageResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ExternalURLUsageResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (URLString, PageTitle)

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Images.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ImagesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ImagesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [PageTitle])
xmlIm :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.ImageUsage.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ImageUsageResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ImageUsageResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Info.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) InfoResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe InfoResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe InfoPage

module MediaWiki.API.Query.LangLinks.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) LangLinksResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe LangLinksResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [LangPageInfo])
xmlLangLink :: Element -> Maybe LangPageInfo

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Links.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) LinksResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe LinksResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [PageTitle])
xmlPageLink :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.LogEvents.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) LogEventsResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe LogEventsResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe LogEvent
xmlParam :: Element -> Maybe LogEventParam

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Random.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) RandomPagesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe RandomPagesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.RecentChanges.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) RecentChangesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe RecentChangesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe RecentChange

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Revisions.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) RevisionsResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe RevisionsResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [Revision])
xmlRevision :: PageTitle -> Element -> Maybe Revision

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Search.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) SearchResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe SearchResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe PageTitle

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Templates.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) TemplatesResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe TemplatesResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe (PageTitle, [PageTitle])

module MediaWiki.API.Query.UserContribs.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) UserContribsResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe UserContribsResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe UserContrib

module MediaWiki.API.Query.UserInfo.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) UserInfoResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe UserInfoResponse
xmlBlockInfo :: Element -> Maybe (String, String)
xmlGroup :: Element -> Maybe [String]
xmlRights :: Element -> Maybe [String]
xmlRateLimit :: Element -> Maybe [RateLimit]
xmlOption :: Element -> Maybe [(String, String)]

module MediaWiki.API.Query.Users.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) UsersResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe UsersResponse
xmlPage :: Element -> Maybe UsersInfo

module MediaWiki.API.Query.WatchList.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) WatchListResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe WatchListResponse
xmlWatchList :: Element -> Maybe WatchList


-- | Serializing Parse requests.
module MediaWiki.API.Action.Parse.Import
stringXml :: String -> Either (String, [String]) ParseResponse
xml :: Element -> Maybe ParseResponse
xmlLL :: Element -> Maybe LanguageLink
xmlCat :: Element -> Maybe CategoryLink
xmlLi :: Element -> Maybe Link
xmlTe :: Element -> Maybe Link
xmlIm :: Element -> Maybe URLString
xmlEx :: Element -> Maybe URLString
xmlSe :: Element -> Maybe TOCSection


-- | A Haskell MediaWiki API binding.
module MediaWiki.API

-- | <tt>webGet url req</tt> issues a GET to a MediaWiki server, appending
--   <tt>api.php?</tt> followed by the request <tt>req</tt> to the URL base
--   <tt>url</tt>.
webGet :: URLString -> Request -> IO String

-- | <tt>webGet mbUser url req</tt> issues a POST to a MediaWiki server,
--   appending <tt>api.php?</tt> followed by the request <tt>req</tt> to
--   the URL base <tt>url</tt>.
webPost :: Maybe AuthUser -> URLString -> String -> Request -> IO ([(String, String)], String)
webPostXml :: (String -> Either (String, [String]) a) -> Maybe AuthUser -> URLString -> String -> Request -> IO (Maybe a)
webGetXml :: (String -> Either (String, [String]) a) -> URLString -> Request -> IO (Maybe a)
queryPage :: PageName -> QueryRequest
mkQueryAction :: APIRequest a => QueryRequest -> a -> Action

-- | <tt>loginWiki u usr pass</tt> logs in to MediaWiki install at
--   <tt>url</tt> as user <tt>usr</tt> with password credentials
--   <tt>pass</tt>. Notice that we don't presently allow HTTP Auth to
--   happen in conjunction with the Wiki login.
loginWiki :: URLString -> String -> String -> IO (Maybe LoginResponse)
queryInfo :: URLString -> PageName -> IO String
querySiteIWInfo :: URLString -> IO (Maybe SiteInfoResponse)
queryLangPage :: URLString -> PageName -> Maybe String -> IO String
parseError :: String -> Either (String, [String]) MediaWikiError
xmlError :: Element -> Maybe MediaWikiError
data MediaWikiError
MediaWikiError :: String -> String -> MediaWikiError
mwErrorCode :: MediaWikiError -> String
mwErrorInfo :: MediaWikiError -> String
mwError :: MediaWikiError
data SomeMWException
SomeMWException :: e -> SomeMWException
mwToException :: Exception e => e -> SomeException
mwFromException :: Exception e => SomeException -> Maybe e
throwMWError :: MediaWikiError -> IO a
catchMW :: IO a -> (MediaWikiError -> IO a) -> IO a
handleMW :: (MediaWikiError -> IO a) -> IO a -> IO a
tryMW :: IO a -> IO (Either MediaWikiError a)
type URLString = String
instance Typeable MediaWikiError
instance Typeable SomeMWException
instance Show MediaWikiError
instance Exception MediaWikiError
instance Exception SomeMWException
instance Show SomeMWException
